title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah in Southern Lebanon: Targeting Terrorist Operatives”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked Hezbollah operatives operating in a military structure of the organization in southern Lebanon.

IDF forces identified terrorist operatives from the Hezbollah organization active in a military structure of the organization in the area of Ayta a-Shaab in southern Lebanon.

Shortly after the identification, fighter jets attacked the structure where the operatives were operating.

Following alerts activated at 18:45 in the western Galilee area, a launch was detected crossing from Lebanon and landing in open territory, with no casualties.

IDF forces targeted the sources of fire with artillery.

Attached is documentation of the attack: https://bit.ly/4ddegz2
